name: LivingUpdateEvent
description: LivingUpdateEvent is fired when an Entity is updated. This event is fired whenever an Entity is updated in EntityLivingBase#onUpdate(). This event is fired via the ForgeHooks#onLivingUpdate(EntityLivingBase) . This event is Cancelable . If this event is canceled, the Entity does not update. This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
